lead_paragraph: Marlins manager Don Mattingly nearly sent Jose Fernandez back to the hotel early so he could get extra rest for his start on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Marlins' Fernandez Wins It With Pinch-Hit Double in 12th
headline.main: Marlins' Fernandez Wins It With Pinch-Hit Double in 12th

snippet: Marlins manager Don Mattingly nearly sent Jose Fernandez back to the hotel early so he could get extra rest for his start on Saturday....
